<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1917]]''' – [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] attends a medical board examination. He requires further indoor hospital treatment. His address is given as 9th Royal Defence Corps, Withernsea.
* '''[[1971]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Fay Darrington (16 November 1971)
November: a letter to Miss Fay Darrington]].

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[2011]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'' is released in Australia and [[New Zealand]].
** [[Tuor]], guided by [[Voronwë]], travels to [[Gondolin]] in order to deliver [[Ulmo]]'s message to [[Turgon]].
